mapper.sql:
a.id AS "id", a.couse_id AS "course.id", a.subjective_title AS "subjectiveTitle", a.subjective_answer AS "subjectiveAnswer", a.degree AS "degree", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.is_delete AS "isDelete",
b.couname AS "course.couname", b.couname AS "couname"
left join course b on b.id = a.couse_id left join teacourse tc on tc.couid = b.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO subjective( id, couse_id, subjective_title, subjective_answer, degree, create_time, is_delete ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{course.id}, #{subjectiveTitle}, #{subjectiveAnswer}, #{degree}, #{createTime}, 0 )
mapper.update: UPDATE subjective SET couse_id = #{course.id}, subjective_title = #{subjectiveTitle}, subjective_answer = #{subjectiveAnswer}, degree = #{degree}, create_time = #{createTime} WHERE id = #{id}
